abstract: Atlantic Coast, Big Ten, Big 12, Pacific-12 and Southeastern conferences, so-called Big 5, vote 79-1 to increase their scholarships to cover athletes' full cost of attendance.
lead_paragraph: The five most prominent conferences in college sports voted to increase their scholarships to cover athletes’ full cost of attendance, which is typically several thousand dollars more than colleges currently provide.
snippet: The five most prominent conferences in college sports voted to increase their scholarships to cover athletes’ full cost of attendance, which is typically several thousand dollars more than colleges currently provide.

headline.main: Top Conferences to Allow Aid for Athletes’ Full Bills
headline.print_headline: Top Conferences to Allow Aid for Athletes’ Full Bills
